beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 9 ▓▓▓▓▓|$hero_name is sniffing|a wall, making|thoughtful noises.

beats.text: ‘Someone has been here before us. Look at that mark by the big neon sign that says, ‘Welcome to $storyNeighborhood’. That is high up. A big animal made that. An elephant? Or another Man-Cub with a spray can?’

‘Let's see... up... up! Lift me up, Little man-cub! I need to reach higher than the last one. Stretch! Stand on your toes! We must show them we are giants!’ |VS| insisted $hero_name while trying to jump into the sign.
Ha! There. That’s the spot. We are taller than we were yesterday. That is the only thing that matters,’ |VS| noted $hero_name while marking your names with their paws.
‘We have left our mark as well. Now the whole pack knows we passed this way. Let's keep moving before the owner of that other mark comes back.’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 9  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
